es: Soy un Desarrollador Frontend con más de 3 años de experiencia en la creación de interfaces web eficientes, intuitivas y optimizadas para el rendimiento. Mi enfoque es ofrecer soluciones de calidad centradas en el usuario, garantizando una experiencia fluida, accesible y visualmente atractiva. Trabajo con tecnologías como React, TypeScript, JavaScript y CSS, junto con herramientas como Zustand, Tailwind CSS y Bootstrap.
He participado en proyectos variados, desde sistemas administrativos hasta landing pages y aplicaciones interactivas, siempre priorizando la accesibilidad y la compatibilidad entre navegadores.
Con conocimientos en backend como Node.js, Express y bases de datos como MySQL y MongoDB, aseguro una integración fluida entre frontend y backend para crear aplicaciones robustas y escalables.
en: I am a Frontend Developer with more than 3 years of experience in creating efficient, intuitive and performance optimized web interfaces. My main focus is to deliver quality user-centric solutions, ensuring a smooth, accessible and visually appealing experience. I have acquired a solid background in cutting-edge technologies such as React, TypeScript, JavaScript and CSS, complemented with modern tools such as Zustand, Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap, which I use to create fast and highly customizable applications.I am a Frontend Developer with more than 3 years of experience in creating efficient, intuitive and performance optimized web interfaces. My focus is to deliver quality user-centric solutions, ensuring a smooth, accessible and visually appealing experience. I work with technologies such as React, TypeScript, JavaScript and CSS, along with tools such as Zustand, Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.

I am a Frontend Developer with more than 3 years of experience in creating efficient, intuitive and performance optimized web interfaces. My focus is to deliver quality user-centric solutions, ensuring a smooth, accessible and visually appealing experience. I work with technologies such as React, TypeScript, JavaScript and CSS, along with tools such as Zustand, Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.
With knowledge in backend like Node.js, Express and databases like MySQL and MongoDB, I ensure a smooth integration between frontend and backend to create robust and scalable applications.
